DOC.brief_title: Breast Cancer Risk Women Who Are BRCA1/BRCA2 Mutation Carriers
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVE : I . To identify potential genetic modifier breast cancer risk woman carrier breast cancer susceptibility gene , BRCA1/2 , collect data genetic information GOG-0199 contributing Consortium Investigators Modifiers BRCA-Associated Breast Cancer ( CIMBA ) , international consortium clinical cancer genetics investigator . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients stratify study , country residence , ethnicity , birth cohort . Joint analysis BRCA1 BRCA2 mutation carrier stratify mutation . Previously collect DNA sample associate clinical information obtain BRCA mutation-positive participant enrol GOG-0199 study . DNA sample analyze mutation test variant ( i.e. , single nucleotide polymorphism [ SNPs ] ) candidate gene interest . Once genetic test give set variant complete , cod laboratory data file merge select demographic , clinical , epidemiological data obtain GOG-0199 baseline questionnaire submit Consortium Investigators Modifiers BRCA-Associated Breast Cancer ( CIMBA ) Central Database analyze publish data . The epidemiological SNP data contribute central database distribute investigator responsible analysis particular SNP set SNPs candidate gene genetic pathway .
DOC.criteria: Women without personal history breast cancer prior enrollment Gynecologic Oncology Group ( GOG ) 0199 Known currently BRCA1/2 mutation carrier either confirm outside report research test No BRCA1/2 mutationnegative mutationunknown status Enrolled clinical trial GOG0199 AND meet follow criterion : Completed baseline questionnaire ( BQ199 ) Provided information previous breast cancer history , include date diagnosis Provided complete data DNA analysis genetic variant interest Available DNA sample analysis Hormone receptor status specify Pre postmenopausal status
